entry.title: Premo Sculpey® Accents Galaxy Glitter, 2 oz bar PE02 5005
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay
Price: 1.66

Premo Sculpey® Accents  Galazy Glitter, 2 ounce bar PE02 5005 (NEW PRODUCT)

The same great polymer clay as premo Sculpey® but the enhanced clays in the premo Sculpey® Accents line allows for making exciting and unique projects using an artist’s palette. The complete line of premo Sculpey® Accents has 26 rich colors:

  • 7 pearlized colors that are great for creating faux semi-precious stones.
  • 6 metallics containing tiny mica particles to create a reflective effect.
  • 2 translucents to lighten clays and provide a transparent effect.
  • 1 granite containing elements that give the appearance of natural stones.
  • 8 glitters for creating projects with a glittery, sparkly finish.
  • 2 bright fluorescents to add a pop of color.

entry.title: Premo Sculpey® Navy 2 oz bar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay
Price: 1.66

Premo Sculpey® Clay Navy 2 ounce bar, PE02 5050

Premo Sculpey® is an artist’s dream come true! After conditioning, this clay is soft enough to blend easily but firm enough to hold fine detail and for specialized techniques.

It’s perfect for caning, mokume gane and mica shift. Because premo retains flexibility, the finished product remains very strong and durable. Plus,Premo Sculpey® comes in 25 inspiring, unique colors to complement your creations with the most vibrant variety of shades.

Wondering how to use Premo Sculpey® for the best results? Condition with a clay conditioning machine then use your hands and tools to create the details you want for your finished products. Buy Premo Sculpey® online today, then follow our Premo Sculpey® baking instructions below to complete your creations!

entry.title: Premo Sculpey®Cayenne 2 oz bar PE02 5054
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polyform
Type: Polymer Clay
Price: 1.66

Premo Sculpey© ClayCayenne 2 ounce bar, PE02 5054

Premo! Sculpey Clay for jewelry, home decor, and sculpture. Dollmakers may mix Translucent Premo! Sculpey with Super Sculpey for increased translucence and strength. Premo! Sculpey is very beneficial used as a "backing," providing greater strength and stability to the item being produced. The lustrous Gold and Silver colors make Premo! Sculpey perfect for jewelry. It is available in 50 colors, including a lustrous Gold and Silver, and a series of pearlescent colors.
